comment: The tabs for my saved open pages is HORRIBLE. The tabs only show about 10 letters of the page. Half the tabs show no pictures. So it is a guessing game as to what those pages are. Who ever designed this needs to be fired. Seriously. Please bring back the list. Until you do I am personally going to stop using the chrome browser and I will check back from time to time to see if this has been fixed.
scenarios: The tabs for saved open pages only show about 10 letters of the page title, making it difficult to identify the pages.
Half of the tabs do not show any pictures, which adds to the difficulty of identifying the pages.
The user prefers the previous list format for displaying saved open pages and expresses a desire for its return.
key sentence: The tabs for saved open pages only show about 10 letters of the page title, making it difficult to identify the pages.
the function of activity: The activity consolidates essential browser and application functions, including navigation, bookmarking, downloading, tab management, privacy, customization, and content translating, content sharing for enhanced user experience and accessibility.
the sub-task list of state: [{'name': 'Open the home page', 'description': "This operation allows the user to open the browser's home page using the provided button."}, {'name': 'Connection is secure', 'description': 'This indicates the security status of the current webpage connected, ensuring the connection is secure.'}, {'name': 'Enter URL', 'description': "Allows the user to enter a URL into the browser's address bar to navigate to a specified webpage."}, {'name': 'Bookmark this page', 'description': 'Enables the user to bookmark the current page, making it easier to access in the future.'}, {'name': 'Switch or close tabs', 'description': 'Provides functionality to switch between open tabs or close them as needed.'}, {'name': 'Customize and control Google Chrome', 'description': 'Offers options to customize and control the Google Chrome browser settings and preferences.'}, {'name': 'Submit Form', 'description': 'Allows the user to submit their entered information for processing and obtaining a quote within 24 hours.'}, {'name': 'Privacy Policy', 'description': 'Provides access to the privacy policy details for the user to review.'}, {'name': 'Submit Price Request', 'description': 'Allows the user to submit a request to obtain the price of the domain within 24 hours.'}, {'name': 'Do not share my personal information', 'description': 'Allows the user to opt out of sharing their personal information.'}, {'name': 'Privacy Settings', 'description': 'Enables the user to adjust privacy settings according to their preferences.'}]
